name: Bacardi Cocktail
instructions: Shake together with ice. Strain into glass and serve
description:
The Bacardí Cocktail was originally the same as the Daiquiri, containing rum, lime juice, and sugar; The Grenadine version of the Bacardí Cocktail originated in the US, while the original non-red Bacardí company recipe originated from Cuba.
On April 28, 1936 the New York Supreme Court ruled that the drink must contain Bacardí rum in order to be called a Bacardí cocktail.

ingredients.name: Light Rum
ingredients.description: White rum, also known as light or silver rum, is a type of rum that is clear and colorless. It is often unaged or aged for a very short period in stainless steel or other neutral containers, which prevents it from developing the color and flavor that result from prolonged aging in wooden barrels.
